verses.verse: In those days <S%H3117><s%> there was no king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and in those days <S%H3117><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the Danites <S%H1839><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to dwell in <S%H3427><s%>; for unto that day <S%H3117><s%> all their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> had not fallen <S%H5307><s%> unto them among <S%H8432><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> of their family <S%H4940><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> from their coasts <S%H7098><s%>, men <S%H1121><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, from Zorah <S%H6881><s%>, and from Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>, to spy <S%H7270><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%>, and to search <S%H2713><s%> it; and they said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Go <S%H3212><s%>, search <S%H2713><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>: who when they came <S%H935><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, they lodged <S%H3885><s%> there. men of: Heb. sons of

When they were by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, they knew <S%H5234><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the young man <S%H5288><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%>: and they turned in <S%H5493><s%> thither, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Who brought <S%H935><s%> thee hither <S%H1988><s%>? and what makest <S%H6213><s%> thou in this place? and what hast thou here?
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus <S%H2090><s%> and thus <S%H2090><s%> dealeth <S%H6213><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> with me, and hath hired <S%H7936><s%> me, and I am his priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Ask counsel <S%H7592><s%>, we pray thee, of God <S%H430><s%>, that we may know <S%H3045><s%> whether our way <S%H1870><s%> which we go <S%H1980><s%> shall be prosperous <S%H6743><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Go <S%H3212><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>: before <S%H5227><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is your way <S%H1870><s%> wherein ye go <S%H3212><s%>.

Then the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to Laish <S%H3919><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that were therein <S%H7130><s%>, how they dwelt <S%H3427><s%> careless <S%H983><s%>, after the manner <S%H4941><s%> of the Zidonians <S%H6722><s%>, quiet <S%H8252><s%> and secure <S%H982><s%>; and there was no magistrate <S%H3423><s%> <S%H6114><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, that might put them to shame <S%H3637><s%> in any thing <S%H1697><s%>; and they were far <S%H7350><s%> from the Zidonians <S%H6722><s%>, and had no business <S%H1697><s%> with any man <S%H120><s%>. magistrate: Heb. possessor, or, heir of restraint
And they came <S%H935><s%> unto their brethren <S%H251><s%> to Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>: and their brethren <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, What say ye?

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Arise <S%H6965><s%>, that we may go up <S%H5927><s%> against them: for we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and, behold, it is very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>: and are ye still <S%H2814><s%>? be not slothful <S%H6101><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%>, and to enter <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

When ye go <S%H935><s%>, ye shall come <S%H935><s%> unto a people <S%H5971><s%> secure <S%H982><s%>, and to a large <S%H7342><s%> land <S%H776><s%>: for God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> it into your hands <S%H3027><s%>; a place <S%H4725><s%> where there is no want <S%H4270><s%> of any thing <S%H1697><s%> that is in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And there went <S%H5265><s%> from thence of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Danites <S%H1839><s%>, out of Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and out of Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> appointed <S%H2296><s%> with weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>. appointed: Heb. girded

And they went up <S%H5927><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Kirjathjearim <S%H7157><s%>, in Judah <S%H3063><s%>: wherefore they called <S%H7121><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanehdan <S%H4265><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>: behold, it is behind <S%H310><s%> Kirjathjearim <S%H7157><s%>.
And they passed <S%H5674><s%> thence unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>.

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> of Laish <S%H3919><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto their brethren <S%H251><s%>, Do ye know <S%H3045><s%> that there is <S%H3426><s%> in these houses <S%H1004><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%>, and teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, and a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, and a molten image <S%H4541><s%>? now therefore consider <S%H3045><s%> what ye have to do <S%H6213><s%>.

And they turned <S%H5493><s%> thitherward, and came <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the young man <S%H5288><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%>, even unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, and saluted <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7965><s%> him. saluted: Heb. asked him of peace

And the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> appointed <S%H2296><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, which were of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, stood <S%H5324><s%> by the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And the five <S%H2568><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>, and came in <S%H935><s%> thither, and took <S%H3947><s%> the graven image <S%H6459><s%>, and the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, and the molten image <S%H4541><s%>: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> in the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> with the six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that were appointed <S%H2296><s%> with weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>.

And these went <S%H935><s%> into Micah's <S%H4318><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and fetched <S%H3947><s%> the carved image <S%H6459><s%>, the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, and the molten image <S%H4541><s%>. Then said <S%H559><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> unto them, What do <S%H6213><s%> ye?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Hold thy peace <S%H2790><s%>, lay <S%H7760><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> with us, and be to us <S%H1961><s%> a father <S%H1><s%> and a priest <S%H3548><s%>: is it better <S%H2896><s%> for thee to be a priest <S%H3548><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, or that thou be a priest <S%H3548><s%> unto a tribe <S%H7626><s%> and a family <S%H4940><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

And the priest's <S%H3548><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> was glad <S%H3190><s%>, and he took <S%H3947><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and the teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, and the graven image <S%H6459><s%>, and went in <S%H935><s%> the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
So they turned <S%H6437><s%> and departed <S%H3212><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> the little ones <S%H2945><s%> and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> and the carriage <S%H3520><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

And when they were a good way <S%H7368><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> that were in the houses <S%H1004><s%> near to Micah's <S%H4318><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> were gathered together <S%H2199><s%>, and overtook <S%H1692><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>.

And they cried <S%H7121><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>. And they turned <S%H5437><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto Micah <S%H4318><s%>, What aileth thee, that thou comest with such a company <S%H2199><s%>? comest: Heb. art gathered together?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Ye have taken away <S%H3947><s%> my gods <S%H430><s%> which I made <S%H6213><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and ye are gone away <S%H3212><s%>: and what have I more? and what is this that ye say <S%H559><s%> unto me, What aileth thee?

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Let not thy voice <S%H6963><s%> be heard <S%H8085><s%> among us, lest angry <S%H4751><s%> <S%H5315><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%> run <S%H6293><s%> upon thee, and thou lose <S%H622><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>, with the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy household <S%H1004><s%>. angry: Heb. bitter of soul

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%>: and when Micah <S%H4318><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were too strong <S%H2389><s%> for him, he turned <S%H6437><s%> and went back <S%H7725><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> the things which Micah <S%H4318><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%> which he had, and came <S%H935><s%> unto Laish <S%H3919><s%>, unto a people <S%H5971><s%> that were at quiet <S%H8252><s%> and secure <S%H982><s%>: and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And there was no deliverer <S%H5337><s%>, because it was far <S%H7350><s%> from Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, and they had no business <S%H1697><s%> with any man <S%H120><s%>; and it was in the valley <S%H6010><s%> that lieth by Bethrehob <S%H1050><s%>. And they built <S%H1129><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> Dan <S%H1835><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>, who was born <S%H3205><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%>: howbeit <S%H199><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was Laish <S%H3919><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> the graven image <S%H6459><s%>: and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, he and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were priests <S%H3548><s%> to the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Dan <S%H1839><s%> until the day <S%H3117><s%> of the captivity <S%H1540><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And they set them up <S%H7760><s%> Micah's <S%H4318><s%> graven image <S%H6459><s%>, which he made <S%H6213><s%>, all the time <S%H3117><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>.
